Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory8.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "The recording says that we don't have to prepare the clothes and rings for the wedding...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Then we're left with the venue, guests, witnesses, and decorations.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, are you really trying to host a wedding for a projection device?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "...Can't I? I'll try not to take up time from the mission. I'm sure Commandant can allow that?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll help.", 3: '11', 4: "Actually, I don't agree with this.", 5: '12'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Really? That's great! I knew you'd say that, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "See? It's weird organizing a wedding for projections, however you put it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Will you let me have this, Commandant? Just once? It must have been their last wish when they were still alive...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The squads nearby and the members from the Support Force are interested after hearing about it as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Interested?', 3: '25', 4: 'Has the news spread that far already?', 5: '26'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's right. They're all coming our way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're messaging each other digitally, after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No one has ever witnessed a wedding, and everyone could use some relief amidst the war.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Plus, this area is stabilizing with everyone's combined effort anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's organize an eventful diversion off the record, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'If Lucia thinks so...', 3: '31', 4: "Alright, as long as it doesn't impede the mission.", 5: '32'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then we're good, having Commandant's permission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Of course.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Does that mean the wedding is on? That's great!", 4: '1'}
